entities.name: krum
entities.description: Krum is introduced as a character in the story, specifically mentioned as staring up at him. He is described as being tall.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is also introduced as a character in the story, and is having a conversation with Krum.

entities.name: skeeter woman
entities.description: Skeeter woman is mentioned as someone who is making things up about Harry and his relationship with Krum.

entities.name: hermy-own-ninny
entities.description: Hermy-own-ninny is mentioned by Krum as talking about Harry very often.

relationships.description: Krum and Harry are described as friends, with Harry elaborating on their relationship to clarify that they are not romantically involved.
Hermy-own-ninny is mentioned as talking about Harry very often, indicating a relationship between the two.
